name: Our Home (itch) (GhostPandaFestival)
description:
You awaken to the ring of your doorbell, but something doesn't feel right.

Our Home is a horror game that takes ~10 minutes to play through.

My first original horror game! Feedback and bug reports are appreciated.

Textures Used:

  • Painting textures generated through Craiyon AI
  • Vintage wallpaper texture
  • Grass texture
